title: Kuroshitsuji - Inversion  (Doujinshi)
description:
Chapter 1- Switch Body :After eating a special cake Ciel and Sebastian switch bodies!Read this funny doujinshi where Ciel is in Sebastian's body and Sebastian in Ciel's body.

Chapter 2- Vice Versa : Ciel become the butler and Sebastian the master !
